material.mattext:
Getting information from the five number summary:

a. Half of the actors won the Oscar before what age?
b. What is the range covered by all the actors ages?
c. What is the range covered by the middle 50% of the ages?

a. Half the actors won the Oscar before age 42.5 (the median)
b. The range covered by all the ages is the Range: Max-min=76-31=45
c.The range covered by the middle 50% of the ages is the IQR which is Q3-Q1=50.25-37.25=13
